root.name: Super Monkey Ball: Step & Roll
root.description: Super Monkey Ball: Step Roll is the second Wii game in the Super Monkey Ball franchise. As with other games in the series, gameplay involves tilting the mazes to navigate the monkey to the goal, using either the Wii Remote or, for the first time, the Wii Balance Board.In addition to the main game, Step Roll offers 21 minigames, some of which are reused from Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz.
